abstract: Intel said Thursday that it has agreed to buy Wind River Systems, a provider of software and services for embedded and mobile devices, for $884 million in cash.
snippet: Intel said Thursday that it has agreed to buy Wind River Systems, a provider of software and services for embedded and mobile devices, for $884 million in cash.
lead_paragraph: Intel said Thursday that it has agreed to buy Wind River Systems, a provider of software and services for embedded and mobile devices, for $884 million in cash.

headline.main: Intel to Buy Wind River for $884 Million
